ygData.subject: Re: Everyone says we cast fast....
ygData.msgSnippet: My question is when you come accross an artifact, how can you tell what it does ? ... Saleen High Elf Wizard - Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
My question is when you come accross an artifact, how can you tell what it
does ?

At 03:42 PM 4/19/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
>other classes regenerate mana faster because they have a smaller amount.
>also, there is a very rare and valuable magic ring that let's you regenerate
>mana 3 times as fast (and there's one that does the same for health) i dont
>know where it is though.
>
>I can't wait for the first artifact to be discovered
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 9:13 AM
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Everyone says we cast fast....
>
>
>>From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>>
>>You're right, it does take us long to cast, and is very hard to time casts
>>at higher lvls. That's why if root doesn't work for me i'm pretty much
>>either going to be able to run successfully, or I'm going to die. But, it
>>is true that wizards cast faster than any other spell casters, so can you
>>imagine what it must be like for them? As for mana regeneration I don't
>>have a clue, hopefully we will get spells or something that will speed up
>>this process because it is terribly long. Do other classes regenerate mana
>>quicker than us?
>>
>>
>>Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Shane <xscion@...>
>>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>>Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 11:55 AM
>>Subject: [eq_wizards] Everyone says we cast fast....
>>
>>
>>>From: "Shane" <xscion@...>
>>>
>>> I'm confused. I am a level 17 Wizard on Fennin Ro. I find that the
>>>only way I can nuke an opponent is to Root him first because it is utterly
>>>impossible to Nuke, say, Ambassador DVinn while he's piercing you. I am
>>>excellent at timing casts, and they just attack to fast for us to get the
>>>cast before their next hit, and most likely, they will. I don't see at
>all
>>>how Wizards cast fast, that's one of our fallbacks, the other is the long
>>>waiting times for mana regeneration. But no worries. There are things
>you
>>>may get that help restoration of mana. Back to casting... It's terribly
>>>slow, Flame Shock takes a LONG time to cast, and it is impossible to cast
>>it
>>>on enemies that can Duel Wield and Bash. Thankfully Root is there to save
>>>you, because Root casts relativlely fast, but Root hardly holds. And my
>>>Alteration is maxed. I have 142 INT, soon to be 148. I get 5 casts out
>of
>>>Flame Shock for 102 Dmg each on enemies with lower magic resistance. Ok,
>>>well, that was a fun chat. I still love my Wizard and would never give
>him
>>>up for any other class.
>>>
>>>
>>>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>>Did you know that we add over 1,000 new e-mail communities every day?
>>>http://www.ONElist.com
>>>Explore a new hobby, discover a new friend, laugh at a new joke!
>>
>>
>>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>Did you know that we add over 1,000 new e-mail communities every day?
>>http://www.ONElist.com
>>Explore a new hobby, discover a new friend, laugh at a new joke!
>>
